title: গরিব রথ ট্রেন বন্ধ হওয়া নিয়ে চাপান-উতর

vclaim: The Garib Rath was an initiative of @laluprasadrjd in 2006 to make air-conditioned trains accessible to the poor. The Modi government is now planning to discontinue all Garib Rath trains and convert it into Superfast trains. https://t.co/E7XfdLA3BE
